actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to reduce the maximum capital gains rates for individual taxpayers and to reduce the holding period for long-term capital gain treatment to 1 month, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to: (1) revise a specified formula in order to reduce the maximum capital gains rates for individuals; and (2) decrease from one year to one month the holding period required for long-term capital gain treatment.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to reduce the maximum capital gains rates for individual taxpayers and to reduce the holding period for long-term capital gain treatment to 1 month, and for other purposes.
